pages.text: 50|16|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban bangkeut mnoussaalok  daoy yeung doeng chbasa nouv avei  del khluon robsa ke sa nhchu ng kit pi vea .  haey yeung now chit( doeng) khluon ke cheang sa sai k del taphcheab tow  behdaung towtiet .
50|17|( chaur changcha) nowpel del mea la ai kat pir roub kampoung kt  tra(ampeula  ning ampeuaeakrak)  daoy angkouy now khangosdam  ning now  khangchevng .
50|18|real peakyasaamdei delke niyeay chenh mk  ku mean anak khloam meul  ning kttra( mea la ai kat) .
50|19|haey pheap chhucheab nei sechakdeislab ban mokadl yeang pit  brakd .  noh haey chea avei del anak( mnoussa lok) thleab rtkech pi vea .
50|20|haey tre trauv ban ke phlom .  noh haey kuchea thngai nei karosanyea  thveutearounakamm( champoh puok brachheang) .
50|21|haey krob  roub mean anaknea phlauv  ning anak thveusaeaksaei( mea la- ai kat) ban mk cheamuoy ke( mk chuob a l laoh now thngai barlok) .

50|22|chea karpit nasa  anak thleab prongeuy k ndeu y pi rueng nih .  dau che  neah  yeung ban leatatradeang kar betbang robsa anak aoy anak kheunh  haey kar meulkheunh robsa anak now thngainih chbasa bamphot .
50|23|haey mea la ai kat del now cheamuoy ke ban pol tha  nih chea avei( sievphow kamnttra) delke triem ruoch chea se  r chnow  cheamuoy khnhom .
50|24|( a l laoh ban mean bantoul towkean mea la ai kat teangpir  roub noh tha)  chaur anak teangpir baoh puok del brachheang chchesarungrousa tow  knong nork cheu han na
50|25|del puokke chea anak kamnanh( champoh kar brichcheak) knong meakra la  chea anak bampean  chea anak sangsay( leu karosanyea nei kar tabasnang robsa  a l laoh) choh .
50|26|ku anak del ban yk mcheasa phe  sa ng mk korp sakkar ruom chea  muoy a l laoh .  dau che  neah  chaur anak teangpir baoh ke chaul tow knong tearoun- kamm da thngonthngor choh .

50|27|koukn robsa ke( shai t n) ban niyeay tha  ao mcheasa robsa puok  yeung.  khnhom minban thveu aoy ke v nge  v ng laey  kabonde ke khluoneng te del ban  sthet knong pheap v nge  v ng da sen chhngay noh .
50|28|trong ban mean bantoul tha  puok anak kom chhlohbrakek knea now  champohmoukh yeung aoy saoh  proh chea karpit nasa  yeung ban phdal kar  promean champoh puok anak ruochamk haey .
50|29|bantoul robsa yeung min ach ke kebre ban laey  haey yeung  ka minmen chea anak bampean leu khnhom teangoasa robsa yeung der .
50|30|( chaur changcha) now thngai del yeung nung suor towkean nork cheu- han nam tha  tae eng penh haey ryy now?  pelnoh nork tb vinh tha  tae mean banthem tiet der ryyte
50|31|haey thansuokr trauv ban ke dak now chit banda anak del  kaotakhlach a l laoh  daoy now min chhngay( pi puokke) laey .
50|32|( mean ke niyeay towkean anak thansuokr tha) nih kuchea avei del  ke sanyea cheamuoy puok anak  samreab real anak del sarphap kamhosa ning  anak del theroksaa katapvokechch robsa a l laoh .
50|33|ku anak del kaotakhlach mcheasa da mha sabborsa  daoy athr-kambang  ning neamk nouv duong chetd del sarphap kamhosa .
50|34|chaur puok anak chaul tow knong vea( thansuokr) daoy sokh sa ndi pheap  choh .  noh kuchea thngai amt .
50|35|nowknong noh  puokke meanei  v  del puokke brathnea chngban  haey yeung nung banthem cheachraen tiet  .
